title: What Does It Mean When Someone Kisses You on the Cheek?

steps.title: A kiss on the cheek can be romantic, but it depends on who it’s from.
steps.content: A kiss on the cheek can be romantic, but it depends on who it’s from. If a crush or single, eligible acquaintance kisses you on the cheek, there's a big chance they have feelings for you. [1] X Research source This is especially true if the kiss happens in an intimate, private moment where it's just the two of you. Generally, a romantic kiss on the cheek is followed by a flirtatious compliment or instigated randomly throughout conversation (unlike a friendly greeting upon first seeing each other). A kiss on the cheek may be their way of seeing if you like them too—they’re gauging your interest. [2] X Research source

steps.title: A kiss on the cheek could be a friendly greeting.
steps.content: A kiss on the cheek could be a friendly greeting. In many cultures, a quick peck on the cheek is a way of saying, “Hi! How are you? It’s been so long.” Think of it like a platonic hug or handshake, just a bit more personal. Relatives and friends (of the same and opposite sex) tend to do this in Europe and Asia. [3] X Research source In most countries, you kiss the right cheek first in greeting. Many people don’t end up actually touching the cheek they’re kissing with their lips. They do an air kiss, hovering over the cheek and making a quick kissing noise.

steps.title: A kiss on the cheek can also be a platonic expression of love.
steps.content: A kiss on the cheek can also be a platonic expression of love. In many instances, a kiss on the cheek is a way of saying, “I love and care for you,” in a friendly, supportive, and endearing way. This is often the case when relatives or family members kiss each other on the cheek. For instance, a father may kiss his daughter on the cheek before leaving for a trip, or a mother might kiss her daughter on the cheek before her first school dance.

steps.title: Smile.
steps.content: Smile. One of the best ways to react to a kiss on the cheek is to simply smile! Whether the peck on the cheek is coming from a crush or a distant relative, don’t hesitate to show those pearly whites. This is a great way to show appreciation for the kind gesture and reflect that it warmed your heart. If your crush or partner kisses you on the cheek, follow up your smile with a wink, flirty remark, or other form of kiss. If a relative or friend kisses you on the cheek in greeting, follow your smile with a friendly, “How are you?”

steps.title: Express your appreciation for them.
steps.content: Express your appreciation for them. If someone kisses you on the cheek, they care for you one way or another, so don’t hesitate to show how you feel. You might give them a big hug or say, “I love you.” Either way, let them know how much their support and appreciation means to you.

steps.title: On the hands
steps.content: On the hands A kiss on the back of your hands is usually an endearing gesture that shows respect. You’ve likely seen this kiss in movies featuring royalty, as queens and princesses are often kissed on the hand in greeting. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Forehead kiss
steps.content: Forehead kiss A forehead kiss typically shows admiration and love. Your partner, significant other, or a family member may give you this kiss to show how much they care about and support you. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Nose kiss
steps.content: Nose kiss A kiss on the nose is often a pure and cute gesture. Partners or significant others typically do this kiss to say, “Hey, cutie!” or “I love you loads.” So, if your crush kisses you on the nose, they probably think you’re a cutie!

steps.title: French kiss
steps.content: French kiss A French kiss is an intensely passionate kiss for lovers. This is the ultimate kiss featuring tongue-play—it’s a full-out makeout session! If someone gives you this kiss, they’re likely head-over-heels for you. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Earlobe kiss
steps.content: Earlobe kiss A kiss on the ear is reserved for lovers in the most passionate, intimate moments. This kiss is extremely sensual and can arouse many feelings. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Neck kiss
steps.content: Neck kiss A kiss on the neck is typically reserved for private, intimate moments between lovers. Like an earlobe kiss, a neck kiss is extremely passionate and sensual and often indicates an extreme love or desire. [8] X Research source
